caption.p: Anxiolytic activity of MEHA on elevated plus maze test in mice. Time spend in open arm ( A), time spends in closed arms ( B). Results are expressed in mean ± SEM. *** p < 0.001, significantly different from control; ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s test ( n = 3, per group). MEHA: methanol extract of Homalomena aromatica (200 mg/kg and 400 mg/kg); Reference drug diazepam 1 mg/kg.
